Wilmington.James Armor House: James Armor House is a historic home located near Wilmington, New Castle County, Delaware. It is a ​2 1⁄2-story, stuccoed stone and frame dwelling that was constructed in three major building phases. It consists of a two-story stone rear wing dating to about 1804, a ​2 1⁄2-story vernacular Italianate style stone main block built about 1850, and two-story Colonial Revival style frame wing built in the 1930s.
